articles.title: EA says FIFA mode with loot boxes is the ‘cornerstone’ of the franchise in leaked documents - The Verge
articles.description: Electronic Arts wants to push more players of its hit FIFA franchise to the FIFA Ultimate Team mode, which lets people buy loot boxes to get virtual athletes for their teams, according to documents viewed by CBC News. Loot boxes have been linked to gambling.

articles.author: Gary Gastelu
articles.title: April 26th is Hemi Day, but what does that mean? - Fox News
articles.description: April 26th is known as Hemi Day to some Mopar fans, as it corresponds with the displacement of the 426 Hemi V8 engine. A modern 1,000 hp Hellephant version of the motor is currently on sale for custom car builds starting at $29,995.
articles.content:
Happy Hemi Day!
That's the unofficial designation for April 26, at least among the "Mopar or no car" crowd.
It's a reference to the numerical version of the date, 4/26, which corresponds with the d… [+1615 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Pokémon Go: Xerneas and Yveltal coming in Luminous Legends events - Polygon
articles.description: Legendary Pokémon Xerneas and Yveltal are coming to Pokémon Go as part of the Luminous Legends X and Luminous Legends Y event. Also coming to Pokémon Go soon: Spritzee, Swirlix, Goomy, Pancham, and Shiny Galarian Ponyta.

articles.description: Legends of Runeterra’s new expansion is called Guardians of the Ancient and Riot has released its great-looking trailer. The expansion is part of the Empire of the Ascended set and will introduce 42 new cards, including 3 new champions.
